Gluten free option available 22.95 $ Fish & Chips Beer battered cod, Old Bay tartar sauce, French fries, southern slaw 19.95 $ Baby Back Ribs Southern slaw, French fries Half Rack 20.95 $ Half Rack 30.95 $ Served with freshly baked bread, house salad or caesar salad and a choice of one side Gill & Grill Combos *10oz Dry Rub Sirloin with Crab & Shrimp Florentine Topped with shrimp, crab & spinach cream sauce 26.95 $ *12oz Ribeye & Coconut Shrimp Ribeye, sweet Thai duck sauce 34.95 $ Served with freshly baked bread, house salad or Caesar salad and a choice of one side Signature Steak Board Steak Cuts *10oz Dry Rub Sirloin 23.95 $ *8oz Filet Mignon 32.95 $ *12oz Ribeye 29.95 $ *12oz Drunken Ribeye 31.95 $ *18oz Tbone 32.95 $ *12oz Prime Rib Friday - Sunday, while available 31.95 $ Accompaniments SautÃ©ed Mushrooms & Onions 4 $ Bleu Cheese Crust 4 $ Grilled or Fried Jumbo Shrimp 8 $ Coconut Shrimp 8 $ Steak Temperature Rare - cool red center Medium Rare - warm red center Medium - warm pink center Medium Well - slightly pink center Well Done - little to no pink Sides Rice Pilaf 5.95 $ Southern Slaw Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Yukon Mashed Potatoes Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Idaho Baked Potato Gluten free option available 5.95 $ French Fries 5.95 $ Seasonal Vegetable Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Flash Fried Brussels Sprouts 5.95 $ Sweet Potato Gluten free option available 5.95 $ Yellow Stone Ground Cheddar Grits 5.95 $ Warm Bread Loaf Served with House Made Maple Butter 2.95 $ Gluten Free option available - These items can be altered to be gluten friendly TBonz is not a gluten free environment. Our menu items are handcrafted in our kitchens, oftentimes using shared equipment (including common fryers) and variations in vendor-supplied ingredients may occur. For these reasons, we cannot assure you that any menu item will be entirely gluten free.
*These items contain raw or undercooked ingredients. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish and eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness, especially if you have a medical condition. A possible health risk may exist in eating undercooked ground beef at an internal temperature less than 155 degrees. Immediate consumer or purchaser must be 18 years of age or older and notified in advance.

[Page Title: TBonz Gill & Grill]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 19 Slide 2 of 19 Slide 3 of 19 Slide 4 of 19 Slide 5 of 19 Slide 6 of 19 Slide 7 of 19 Slide 8 of 19 Slide 9 of 19 Slide 10 of 19 Slide 11 of 19 Slide 12 of 19 Slide 13 of 19 Slide 14 of 19 Slide 15 of 19 Slide 16 of 19 Slide 17 of 19 Slide 18 of 19 Slide 19 of 19 
NOT JUST GREAT STEAKS

For more than three decades, TBonz Gill & Grill has provided the community with a relaxed atmosphere and excellence in service. Known for Â hand-cut Certified Angus Beef steaks and preparing everything in house daily, TBonz also boasts a diverse menu of signature appetizers, local seafood and low country specialties. All three of our TBonz Gill & Grill restaurants feature a family-friendly dining room and plenty of options to please any palate. Happy Hour in the bar attracts both locals and tourists alike, with local craft beers and full bar service.

Our Food

We proudly serve brand steaks and burgers to provide you with the highest quality beef available. 10 strict standards set the brand apart. The secret to the outstanding flavor is marblingâ€”the little, white flecks within the meat that ensure every bite is flavorful and juicy. Since its start in 1978, the brand has required Angus beef to meet a long list of standards for flavor, tenderness and juiciness. Youâ€™ll taste the difference in every juicy, tender and flavorful bite.
Certified Angus Beef Â® A cut above USDA Prime, Choice and Select, Certified Angus Beef's Â® Certified Angus Beef Â® 
Private Parties
Get the Party Started 
Mark and Jerry's Most Excellent Steak Sauce

Congratulations! You just found the most excellent steak sauce you'll ever taste! Give Mark and Jerry's Most Excellent Steak Sauce a tryâ€”you won't want anything without it.
Sauce Like A Boss 
Come Visit Us

Discover the delicious offerings we have every day of the week.
Learn More Email Signup
